talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Norfe$
Welcome back. Have you given the matter some thought?

${user_nick}$
Yes, thank you for waiting.
Actually, I have something to say.

$Norfe$
Sure, I had assumed you would. Please tell us what's on your mind, {user_nick}.
Once you are finished talking, I too will have something to add.

${user_nick}$
(Everyone is looking at me. Calm down... You just have to go ahead and say it.)

${user_nick}$It is true that Rubinart… the 'Red Child'
has done evil.
But that is all because of the Goddess Vestinel. Everyone here knows it.

$Princess Sylvania$
True. Who here claims any different?

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Indeed. And yet it is also true that we cannot simply leave the Red Child be.

${user_nick}$
… Right. We cannot simply turn a blind eye.

$Norfe$
(Norfe looks at you as if surprised.)
{user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
That said, though he may be someone upon whom you seek revenge,
I knew him before he became what he now is. And I cannot simply abandon that Rubinart.

${user_nick}$
And I get it! I know full well, even though it pains me greatly, what it means to be a Child.
That's why I won't try to stop you exacting vengeance on the 'Red Child'. However!

${user_nick}$
I have one condition:
That you don't try to stop us from saving 'Rubinart'.

$Princess Sylvania$
… What?!

${user_nick}$
"Rubinart gets what he deserves, and the Red Child gets what he has coming.
I am more than happy to differentiate between the two." Isn't that what you said, Princess?

${user_nick}$
I am going to find out how to use the Cup of Healing. I will bring 'Rubinart' back.
As long as a chance remains that he can be saved, I will not abandon him!

$Princess Sylvania$
Hey, I don't want a fight, you know.
But how does this make any sense? This is no time for games, {user_nick}!

$Norfe$
Actually, what {user_nick} said is perfectly valid.

$Princess Sylvania$
What are you talking about? Fine, let's distinguish between the two.
But where is Rubinart right now?! He's the Red Child! What do you mean, "Don't stop you from saving Rubinart?!"

$Norfe$
I believe the time has come for me to have my say.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9944_sp_01.ogg}
Rubinart played a major role in establishing and maintaining the Anti-Goddess Faction.
As a result, I was able to determine what kind of person Rubinart is.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9944_sp_02.ogg}
So I have something to say to the Princess in that regard.
Even though he has become what he is now, Rubinart was once our stalwart ally.

$Norfe$
At the same time, what was Aergal doing
in our most dire moment of need?

$Princess Sylvania$
That's not-...!

$Norfe$
You all hid. You went into hiding in your deep underground bunker.
I can't argue with that. I understand it. If we had the technology to do so, we would have done the same.

$Princess Sylvania$
(Her face turns pale.)
Was that a mistake? So, are you saying we should have stood up against the Goddess and Childs?

$Norfe$
Don't get it twisted. There's nothing wrong with hiding and avoiding the fight.
It's a fully understandable method of survival. It's just that Rhadames took a different approach than Aergal.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9944_sp_03.ogg}
That said, while you were all in hiding, Rubinart and the rest of us stepped up to
accept and protect the refugees.
We put our lives on the line to protect them. Just as we have done for the people of Aergal.

$Norfe$
We have sacrificed much and suffered dearly so that you and the refugees of Aergal can be safe today.
That was the method we chose.

$Norfe$
Akademia, Daedalus… The names of those we lost make a long list.
Please try to understand, even a little, why we don't want to add the name 'Rubinart' to that list.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9944_sp_04.ogg}
Of course, I don't just say this out of mere sentiment.
If we could heal Rubinart with the Cup of Healing, what would the reward be?
With him on our side we would have the strongest ally possible to stand against the evil touch of the Goddess.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
That's only when he's Rubinart.
Right now, he is actually the strongest minion of the Goddess.

$Norfe${sound:npc_Nophee_qu9944_sp_05.ogg}
That's the issue. If we can successfully heal him,
we not only remove her favorite piece from the board, we gain it for ourselves.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Heal him… It sounds nice, but is it possible?
It seems like empty talk to me.

$Norfe$
But we already have an example.
The Mutant Child who escaped the Goddess' grasp.

$Grele$
……

$Princess Sylvania$
Mutant Child… It sounds absurd, but then... If it is possible...
(Sylvania begins to deeply consider the matter.)

$Norfe$
Of course, this is only applicable if we can determine how to use the Cup of Healing to bring Rubinart back to us.
I believe {user_nick} has put some thought into the matter.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
(Ultima looks at you with a penetrating gaze.)
{user_nick} and I have already discussed this.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
As I have said, I mean to get payback from the Goddess for killing my family and trampling my homeland.
I will kill the Goddess' children and take her land, this entire world, away from her.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
I told her that I won't stop, even if it means this Rubinart is killed in the process...
My resolve has not changed.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_01.ogg}
You are truly virtuous people, but you can't right the wrongs of this world with a good heart alone.
What we're trying to do... It's about ripping out the very rotten core of this world.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_02.ogg}
So tell me again, {user_nick}. Do you mean to save Rubinart in spite of what I have just said?
No matter who among us comes forward to stop you?

${user_nick}$
…I will save him. I will heal Rubinart with the Cup of Healing.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
How direct.
It is as if you two are family. That boy as well.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
(Ultima looks to the sky.)

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_03.ogg}
I know what it means to be family to a Child.
Our vengeance or Rubinart's salvation... Let's see which of the two comes to pass.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_04.ogg}
My target is the Goddess.
Goddess Vestinel must pay for allowing countless souls to die in despair.
I don't care why you come with us.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
What Norfe says is right. Yes…
Whether Rubinart returns to normal or the Red Child dies, the Goddess loses her most powerful soldier.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_05.ogg}
I will cut down anything that gets in my way and treat anything that helps my cause accordingly.
If it is the Red Child I meet, I will cut him down... and if it is Rubinart, I will take a different approach.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima${sound:npc_Mugeuk_qu9944_sp_06.ogg}
That is my opinion. What say you, Princess?
Will you come with us? Or perhaps you might go another way. Regardless, I know you will not help the Goddess.

$Princess Sylvania$
Quit talking like I have a choice!
My people owe Rhadames, after all.

$Princess Sylvania$
Even so… I respect the sacrifices Rhadames has made.
The fact that we are safe is all thanks to those sacrifices.

$Princess Sylvania$
(Sylvania looks over to {user_nick}.)
And… it's true that killing one Child won't solve the bigger issue… Tsk…

$Princess Sylvania${sound:npc_Sylviana_qu9944_sp_01.ogg}
That being said...! I want you to promise me: I won't stop you from healing Rubinart,
but in return you better not try to stop me from getting revenge on the Red Child!

$Princess Sylvania$
Good, I think I can hold you to that.
Okay then, I'm on board!

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Then it's time to talk about this place.
That explosion trick was impressive, but had its limits.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Since it was an extreme operation that could only be used once,
it will be necessary to prepare something else for the next Child invasion.

$Norfe$
Right. Simply put, we need more firepower.
With that in mind, I would like to express my thanks to the Blue Clan for coming.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
Indeed, the Blue Clan will do its utmost to protect Rhadames…
But considering the might of the Goddess' army, we might not be enough.

$Norfe$
We have economic problems on top of our lack of troops since we've had to cut off all exchanges with the outside world while in hiding.
Moreover, so many Childs have died here at once that the Goddess and her Commanders may turn their focus here.

$Princess Sylvania$
Are you saying you need money in the end?
Use of Aergal's technical skills and manpower will also require resource input, you know.

$Norfe$
We need troops and the funds to support them,
as well as food and material goods so that the people can continue to hold out.
That about sums up the situation.

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
It is a treacherous road ahead.

$Norfe$
This is why I will need {user_nick} to go to Merca.

${user_nick}$
Whaaat?!

$Blue Phoenix Ultima$
(Ultima looks at Norfe with surprise.)

$Norfe$
{user_nick}?

${user_nick}$
Ugh! W-… why me? Why Merca?!
(Vernicka knows what happened to Shalica… So why in Mistland would I go there?)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Seriously... Why is he doing this to me?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Norfe$
Well, it cannot be anyone but you, {user_nick}.

$Princess Sylvania$
What? Why send {user_nick} to the Blue Viper?!
Are you trying to kill {user_nick}?

$Princess Sylvania$
Oh, I get it! You mean to purge {user_nick}! How could you be so cruel?
To send her to that sneaky and ruthless Blue Viper!

$Norfe$
… That's not it.

${user_nick}$
Listen, Norfe. I don't know if this is such a good idea.
Do you really think Vernicka will agree to help… if you send me?

$Norfe$
(Looks your way and smiles lightly.)
That's why I'm sending you. You will go with Grele.

$Grele$
Uh… Me?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… I see. Then I guess we have no choice.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Norfe$
Yes, you. I am certain that something good will come of sending the two of you.

$Norfe$
Thank you. Then we must now turn our discussion to Hiver's Nest.
To be more precise, about how to get in.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Don't Try to Stop Me
journal.contents:
You returned to Rhadames. Everyone is focused on {user_nick}. Relax your shoulders, raise your head, tighten your stomach, and start talking to everyone.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Arguments For and Against
journal.contents:
Everyone is buzzing at the statement, "I won't stop you from saving Rubinart as long as you don't stop me from getting revenge on the Red Child."

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Princess Sylvania in Rhadames
journal.todo_msg: Princess Sylvania is looking your way.

journal.title: Rhadames and Aergal
journal.contents:
Princess Sylvania appears at a loss. She must be surprised about you suddenly telling everyone not to stop you from saving Rubinart. Norfe then begins speaking to the Princess.

Rhadames - Norfe

journal.title: Here, Just Like There
journal.contents:
Fortunately, Norfe supported {user_nick}'s decision. The people gathered seemed a little shaken. Ultima cut the tension and began to speak. You better hear what he has to say.

Rhadames - Blue Phoenix Ultima
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Blue Phoenix Ultima in Rhadames

journal.title: Another Promise
journal.contents:
Ultima drew a line, saying that his sole target was the Goddess. He said that he doesn't care what reasons the others have for helping that cause, as long as he can make the Goddess Vestinel pay for her sins. He then asked the Princess for her opinion.

Rhadames - Princess Sylvania
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Princess Sylvania in Rhadames

journal.title: Realistic Discussion
journal.contents:
Princess Sylvania seems to have agreed with {user_nick}, saying that the true enemy is the Goddess. Now that the debate about vengeance against the Red Child or saving Rubinart is through, it is time to turn to practical matters.

Rhadames - Blue Phoenix Ultima
journal.destination: (Solo) Speak with Blue Phoenix Ultima in Rhadames

journal.title: Now, to Merca
journal.contents:
Rhadames needs military and financial support to remain in hiding and stay safe for the time being. Norfe told {user_nick} to go to Merca for now. But really, Merca? To Vernicka? The Blue Viper who knows what happened to Shalica?

Rhadames - Norfe
